name: Home Cross
description:
Home Cross (also known as Nonograms, Picross, Hanjie or Griddlers) is a brand new Sudoku-like puzzle game.

You just solve each logic puzzle to unlock the amazing home-themed pictures.What are you waiting for? Make yourself at home!

Features
• Tons of manually designed levels
Over 2000 free, funny and brain training levels inside

• Easy to learn, Hard to master

• Tons of hidden pictures to unlock

• Playing the game with your FRIENDS
